mapper.select: /*主页博客展示*/ select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from blog b, type t, user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id order by b.update_time desc

/*后台博客展示*/ select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.type_id, b.published, t.id typeid, t.name typename from blog b, type t where b.type_id = t.id /*博客类型id=类型id*/ order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, u.nickname, u.avatar from blog b, type t, user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and b.type_id = #{typeId} order by b.update_time desc

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, t.id typeid, t1.name tagname, t1.id tagid, u.nickname, u.avatar from blog b, type t, user u, blog_tags tb, tag t1 where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = t1.id and t1.id = #{tagId} order by b.update_time desc
select id, title, recommend from blog where recommend = true order by update_time desc limit 0,${size}

/*博客详情*/ select b.id, b.first_picture, b.flag, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.update_time,b.commentabled, b.share_statement, b.appreciation, u.nickname, u.avatar, tag.id tagid, tag.name tagname from blog b, user u, tag , blog_tags tb where b.user_id = u.id and tb.blog_id = b.id and tb.tag_id = tag.id and b.id = #{id}

select b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.description, t.name typename, u.nickname, u.avatar from blog b, type t, user u where b.type_id = t.id and u.id = b.user_id and (b.title like #{pattern} or b.content like #{pattern}) order by b.update_time desc

/*模糊查询*/ select b.id, b.title, b.update_time, b.recommend, b.published, b.type_id, t.id, t.name from blog b ,type t
b.type_id = t.id /*博客类型id=类型id*/
and b.type_id = #{typeId} /*根据博客类型查询*/
and b.recommend = #{recommend} /*根据博客推荐查询*/
and b.title like #{pattern} /*根据博客title模糊查询*/
mapper.update: update blog set published = #{published},flag = #{flag} , title = #{title}, content = #{content}, type_id = #{typeId}, tag_ids = #{tagIds}, first_picture = #{firstPicture} , description = #{description} , recommend = #{recommend} , share_statement = #{shareStatement}, appreciation = #{appreciation}, commentabled = #{commentabled} ,update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id};
mapper.insert: insert into blog (title, content, first_picture, flag, views, appreciation, share_statement, commentabled,published, recommend, create_time, update_time, type_id, tag_ids, user_id, description) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{firstPicture}, #{flag}, #{views}, #{appreciation}, #{shareStatement}, #{commentabled}, #{published}, #{recommend}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{typeId}, #{tagIds},#{userId}, #{description});
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(b.update_time, '%Y') from blog b order by b.update_time desc
select b.title, b.create_time, b.id, b.flag from blog b where DATE_FORMAT(b.create_time, '%Y') = #{year} ORDER BY create_time desc
